page.title: 08MEDIA IN BANKS/CROSSENS
page.content: THE TWO MAIN LOCAL NEWSPAPERS WHICH COVER THE AREA ARE THE ORMSKIRK ADVERT ISER,WHICH IS WEEKLY,AND THE SOUTHPORT VISITER,WHICH IS TWICE A WEEK.THE LATTER HAS A WEEKLY COLUMN DEVOTED TO EACH VILLAGE ON THE OUTSKIRTS OF SOUTH PORT SO BANKS\CROSSENS NEWS IS ALWAYS INCLUDED .ANOTHER WEEKLY IS THE SOUTHPORT STAR WHICH IS FREE IN THE AREA. THIS AREA RECEIVES B.B.C. LOCAL RADIO LANCASHIRE AND COMMERCIAL RED ROSE RADIO IN ADDITION TO NATIONAL RADIO. WE ARE IN THE GRANADA TELEVISION AREA AND ALSO RECEIVE OUR OWN LOCAL PROGRAMMES UNDER THE B.B.C. OUR NEAREST CINEMAS ARE IN THE NEIGH BOURING CENTRES OF SOUTHPORT,ORMSKIRK, PRESTON,ETC. WITH MORE PEOPLE OWNING VIDEO RECORDERS THERE ARE PLENTY OF LOCAL VIDEO STORES WHO HIRE OR SELL.
